name: Sitti â€” A Chatbot Starter UI Kit
description:
What's this?

A free chatbot template to start your project. The main theme of this prototype is in finding a new smaller, cheaper place to stay but I think it's flexible enough to different use cases. This kit includes:

  1. iOS permission modal
  2. Chat typing animation from Lottie
  3. Smart cards
  4. Full screen zoom in and out
